Text: Half way through install i got blue screen of death. went to install different windows on it and i have no memory on my hard drive. total size 0.0mb free space 0.0 mb. Thanks ass hole for the virus
Do not download infected bad. burned out my hard drive

I find that it's a good general rule on PB to never, ever download anything from some asshole who calls himself 'anonymous'. 

I mean, what's the fucking point? A made-up username is no hassle to create, right? 

 Well, the point is, you can't check their upload history.: now, why would anyone want to hide that from you? Do the math, kids...
